Package org.waarp.ftp.core.session

Classes implementing session

See:
          Description


Class Summary
FtpSession Main class that stores any information that must be accessible from anywhere during the connection of one user.
FtpSessionReference Class that allows to retrieve a session when a connection occurs on the Data network based on the InetAddress of the remote client and the InetSocketAddress of the server for Passive and reverse for Active connections.
 

Package org.waarp.ftp.core.session Description

Classes implementing session
